name: kb-macro
description: Recordable keyboard macro for Visual Studio Code

markdownEnumDescriptions: **Ctrl+Alt+R** for Start/Stop Recording and **Ctrl+Alt+P** for Playback
**Ctrl+Shift+Alt+R** for Start/Stop Recording and **Ctrl+Shift+Alt+P** for Playback
No keybindings. In this case, you have to define your own keys in keybindings.json.

kb-macro.recording && accessibilityModeEnabled && terminalA11yTreeFocus && terminalProcessSupported || kb-macro.recording && accessibilityModeEnabled && terminalFocus && terminalProcessSupported
